Dialogue: You will notice, earthbenders, that this rig is made entirely of metal. You are miles away from any rock or earth. [Lowly.] forget them. It is impossible. Good day.

Dialogue: Katara, I admire your courage. And I envy your youth. But people's lives are at stake here. The warden is a ruthless man, and he won't stand for any rebellion. I'm sorry, but we're powerless.

Minor Characters: Appa, Haru's mother, Momo, Old man, Tax collector, Various earthbenders, Zuko
Antagonists: Various Fire Nation soldiers, The warden
Locations: Mining village, Prison rig, Seaport village

Dialogue: Earthbenders! You don't know me, but I know of you. Every child in my Water Tribe village was rocked to sleep with stories of the brave Earth Kingdom, and the courageous earthbenders who guard its borders. [The watchman walks up to talk the warden, but the warden stops him and listens.] Some of you may think that the Fire Nation has made you powerless. Yes, they have taken away your ability to bend. But they can't take away your courage. And it is your courage they should truly fear! Because it runs deeper than any mine you've been forced to dig, any ocean that keeps you far from home! It is the strength of your hearts that make you who you are. Hearts that will remain unbroken when all rock and stone has eroded away. The time to fight back is now! I can tell you the Avatar has returned! So remember your courage earthbenders, [Shouts clearly.] let us fight for our freedom!

Episode Title: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
Dialogue: What am I supposed to do? Avatar Roku, how can I talk to you? [He turns his head in disappointment, when he hears something.] Sokka? [He notices a dragon coming toward him.] That's definitely not Sokka. [He tries to fly away but cannot. He notices his airbending is not working at all.] What? I can't airbend in the Spirit World. [The dragon lands just before him.] You don't know where Sokka is, do you? [The dragon touches him. He sees a vision of Roku flying on this dragon.] You're Avatar Roku's animal guide! Like Appa is to me! I need to save my friend and I don't know how! Is there some way for me to talk to Roku? [The dragon curls around him, and he gets on him.] I'll be back, Katara. [It gets up.] Take me to Roku! [The dragon flies away.]

Episode Title: Winter Solstice, Part 1: The Spirit World
Dialogue: Hey, what are you doing? [He screams, but they fly right through the roof and into a mysterious room. Within is a celestial calendar and a statue of Roku.] I don't understand, this is just a statue of Roku. [Fang presses one of his feelers to Aang's forehead. A vision of a comet appears to him.] Is that what Roku wants to talk to me about? A comet? When can I talk to him? [Fang moves his head, allowing a light beam to appear. This is just to the right of Roku's statue. With another feeler press, he sees a vision of the sun setting and rising repeatedly, and the light closing in on Roku.] It's a calendar, and the light will reach Roku on the solstice! So, that's when I'll be able to speak to Roku? [The dragon breathes an apparent yes.] But I can't wait that long! I need to save Sokka now! [The dragon takes Aang from the temple.]

Dialogue: You seem like a smart girl Katara, I bet you would enjoy hearing some history. [Fades to show a large gate with a finely dressed man running toward it. Voice-over.] The patriarch of our tribe, Jin Wei, was an earthbender warrior who was assigned an important duty, transporting our sacred orb from the great eastern gate, to the great western gate. Taking the orb from the east to the west represents the sun's rising and setting. It was our tribe's ancient redemption ritual. But as he approached the gate, Jin Wei was attacked by one of the Zhang, a vermin named Wei Jin, who looked at the orb with envy. That coward Wei Jin knocked Jin Wei to the ground, and stole our sacred orb. [Camera goes back to the Gan Jin leader's face.] Our people have never forgotten. You can never trust a Zhang.

Dialogue: Our conflict with the Gan Jin goes back over a hundred years. [Fades to show a poorly-dressed man running through a large gate. Voice-over.] Our forefather Wei Jin was leaving the western gate of our village, when he saw a figure in the distance. It was a man of the Gan Jin tribe, Jin Wei, collapsed on the ground. Noble Wei Jin stopped to help him. Jin Wei was transporting a sacred orb, a very powerful relic used in his tribe's redemption ritual. Wei Jin tried to tend to the man's wounds but Jin Wei insisted the orb was more important, and asked him to take it back to his tribe. Kind Wei Jin promised to send help for the man as soon as he could, but as Wei Jin crossed the border to return the orb into Gan Jin territory, he was arrested. Instead of thanking him for his kind and selfless deed, they sentenced him to twenty long years in prison. [Back to Zhang leader.] We Zhangs will never forget that injustice.

Dialogue: No, I mean I really knew them. I might not look it, but I'm a hundred and twelve years old. I was there one hundred years ago on the day you're talking about. [Scene fades to show the two men facing each other. Voice-over.] There seems to be a lot of confusion about what happened. First of all, Jin Wei and Wei Jin weren't enemies. They were brothers, twins in fact, and they were eight; and most importantly, they were just playing a game! The sacred orb from the legend, that was the ball! And the eastern and western gates were the goal posts. Jin Wei had the ball and was running toward the goal when he fell and fumbled it. Wei Jin didn't steal the ball, he picked it up and started running it toward the other goal, but he stepped out of bounds, so the official put him in the penalty box. Not for twenty long years but for two short minutes. [Fades back to Aang.] There was no stealing and no putting anyone in imprison, it was just a game.

[Cut to a close-up of Iroh's face as he gasps slightly, reaching out a hand in desperation before moving it to his forehead in resignation, believing Jee has gone too far. Cut back to Zuko's face, contorted with rage.] You don't care about anyone but yourself! Then again, what should I expect from a spoiled prince?

Dialogue: That's right. Zuko looked upon the old general he had insulted and declared that he was not afraid. But Zuko misunderstood. [Flashback shows an overview of the chamber; the camera cuts to show Zuko preparing for the Agni Kai.] When he turned to face his opponent, he was surprised to see it was not the general. [Flashback shows the tippet that was on Zuko's shoulders fall down to the ground.] Zuko had spoken out against the general's plan, but by doing so in the Fire Lord's war room, it was the Fire Lord whom he had disrespected. [Frontal shot of a surprised Zuko; as the camera zooms in on him, his expression changes to one of fear.] Zuko would have to duel his own father.

[Aang looks angry again.] See, if you die you will just be reborn and the Fire Nation would have to start searching all over again. So I'll keep you alive, but just barely. [Aang takes a deep breath and blows at gale force at Zhao, who falls over.] Blow all the wind you want, but your situation is futile. There is no escaping this fortress, and no one is coming to rescue you.

Before the war started, I used to always visit my friend Kuzon. The two of us, we'd get in and out of so much trouble together. He was one of the best friends I ever had, and he was from the Fire Nation, just like you. If we knew each other back then, do you think we could have been friends, too?

Locations: Makapu Village, Mt. Makapu

Locations: Makapu Village, Mt. Makapu

Minor Characters: Calm man, Local villagers, Poi and Ping

Dialogue: This is the most reliable method of telling your fortune. The bones never lie. [Urging Aang to pick a bone.] Go on, pick one. [Aang takes one bone and they sit down.] Now throw it on the fire. [Aang tosses the bone into the fire.] The heat makes cracks in the bone and I read the bone cracks to tell your destiny.

Minor Characters: Calm man, Local villagers, Poi and Ping
Locations: Makapu Village, Mt. Makapu

Dialogue: Wow, that's a big crack.

Locations: Makapu Village, Mt. Makapu

Minor Characters: Calm man, Local villagers, Poi and Ping
Locations: Makapu Village, Mt. Makapu

Dialogue: [Her and Aang shielding their faces in surprise.] Oh my! [Cuts to shot of the bone lying in the fire and back to Aunt Wu who is fascinated.] Your destiny! This is incredible. You will be involved in a great battle, an awesome conflict between the forces of good and evil. A battle whose outcome will determine the fate of the whole world!

Dialogue: Are you deaf? How can I teach you if you refuse to listen? Before learning firebending you must learn water and earth. Water is cool and soothing, earth is steady and stable, but fire, fire is alive! It breathes, it grows. Without the bender, a rock will not throw itself! But fire will spread and destroy everything in its path if one does not have the will to control it! That is its destiny! You are not ready! You are too weak!

Its nature is to consume and without control it destroys everything around it. Dialogue: [Sarcastically.] Oh ... Well then thanks for all the first aid over the years. Like when I fell into the greaseberry bramble. [Angrily.] Or that time I had two fishhooks in my thumb!

Minor Characters: Appa, Chey, Guard captain, Lin Yee, Malu, Momo, Roku, Various Fire Nation citizens

Dialogue: [Still being sarcastic.] Oh, and the time that mink snake bit me! Thanks for healing that up. That was great. Really helpful.

Minor Characters: Appa, Chey, Guard captain, Lin Yee, Malu, Momo, Roku, Various Fire Nation citizens

Dialogue: [Dramatically; out of view.] So, travelers. The next time you think you hear a strange, large bird talking, take a closer look. It might not be a giant parrot, but a flying man. A member of a secret group of air walkers, who laugh at gravity, and laugh at those bound to the earth by it!
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Cuts to a wide shot, showing the gang and the other travelers surrounding a small campfire. The Storyteller, having finished his story, is going around collecting coins from the other travelers.] Aren't airbender stories the greatest? [Talking to Katara and Sokka, who are sitting next to him.]
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Excitedly.] Was it realistic? Is that how it was back then?

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: I laugh at gravity all the time. [Chuckling to himself.] Gravity.

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Arrives in front of the gang, having already collected money from the rest of the audience.] Jingle, jingle! [Jingles the hat in front of Sokka, asking for money.]

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: Sorry ...
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Upset and somewhat downcast.] Aww, cheapskates! [Walks away as Sokka puts the bugs back in his pocket.]

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller

Dialogue: Aww, much obliged, little bat-thing. [He pets Momo on the head.]

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Having given up trying to find a coin.] It means a lot to hear airbender stories. It must have been a hundred years ago your great grandpa met them.
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Confused.] What are you prattling about, child? Great Grandpappy saw the air walkers last week. [He indicates to the old man he was kneeling in front of before. The old man makes a sound in his throat akin to a laugh, and waves a greeting to Aang. The shot cuts to Aang, who has a shocked and disbelieving expression.]
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Sitting on Appa's neck, steering. He is talking to Katara and Sokka, who are riding in Appa's saddle.] Hey, we're almost at the Northern Air Temple. This is where they had the championships for Sky Bison polo.

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [He is whittling a piece of wood. The design is indecipherable.] You want me to be like you, or totally honest?
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Crossing her arms, obviously angry with him.] Are you saying I'm a liar?

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [He shrugs, unconcerned with her mood.] I'm saying you're an optimist. Same thing, basically.

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Amazed.] They really are airbenders!

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [His face falls as he sees the 'airbenders', and after Katara's excited outburst, he leans back and scowls while crossing his arms.] No, they're not.
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Exuberantly.] What do you mean "they're not"? Those guys are flying!

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Bitterly. He is glaring at the direction of the people flying around the temple.] Gliding maybe, but not flying. You can tell by the way they move, they're not airbending. Those people have no spirit.

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: I don't know, Aang.[Katara points to the boy.] That kid seemed pretty spirited. [Katara indicates to the boy, who is flying dangerously close, but still laughing.]
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: We better find some solid ground, before it finds us. [The siblings land Appa on the temple courtyard, out of the hazardous sky. Aang is still flying with the boy, and seems to be having fun at the surprise competition.]

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Several children are on the ground, cheering on their friend.] Go Teo! Show that bald kid how it's done!

Dialogue: [The boy doesn't seem upset at Aang, and seems happy that he isn't angry for nearly flying into him.] Hey there, you're pretty good!

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller

Dialogue: [Nonchalantly, but with a smirk.] Yeah, I know. But I can do more than fancy gliding.

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [He is looking amazed, before thinking of his own plan.] Wow, I don't think I can do that. But here's a good one.
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: What do you think?

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Annoyed; his face mimics the one Teo has just drawn.] It's great.

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: Hey, you're a real airbender. You must be the Avatar! That's amazing! I-I've heard stories about you!
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Rubs his head, embarrassed.] Thanks.

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Sokka ignores all formalities, instead going over to Teo's chair and examining the strange shape and design.] Wow! This glider chair is incredible!

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller

Dialogue: You think this is good, wait until you see the other stuff my dad designed.

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: Yeah, my dad is the mastermind behind this whole place. Everything's powered by hot air. [Shows women using an elevator like contraption.] It even pumps hot air currents outside to give us a lift while we're gliding.
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Monotonously.] This place is unbelievable.

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: Yeah, it's great, isn't it?

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: No, just unbelievable. [Walks away.]

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Katara approaches Teo, who seems disappointed at Aang's reaction.] Aang used to come here a long time ago. I think he's a little shocked it's so ... different.

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller

Dialogue: Ugh!

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: What the doodle? Don't you know enough to stay away from construction sites? We have to make room for the bathhouse! [He has approached Aang and the group, looking more surprised than upset.]

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [He turns to the mechanist and yells angrily at him.] Do you know what you did!? You just destroyed something sacred! For a stupid bathhouse!
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: Well, people around here are starting to stink. [Waves his hand in front of his face, as though trying to dissipate a bad smell.]
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Points at the mechanist.] This whole place stinks! [Using his airbending, Aang flips the crane contraption off of the edge of the building.]
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: This is a sacred temple! You can't treat it this way! [Walks closer to the mechanist.] I've seen it when the monks were here! I know what it's supposed to be like!
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: The monks? But, [Scratches his beard.] you're twelve.
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Teo rolls up.] Dad, he's the Avatar. He used to come here a hundred years ago.
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: What are you doing? Who said you could be here?
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Turns away from Aang.] Hmm, doing here ... A long time ago, [Points finger up.] but not a hundred years, my people became refugees [Walks behind his son's wheelchair.] after a terrible flood. My infant son, [Teo looks down sadly.] Teo, was badly hurt and lost his mother. [Sniffles.] I needed somewhere to rebuild and I stumbled across this place. Couldn't believe it! Everywhere! Pictures of flying people! But empty, [Looks around.] nobody home. Then, [Does a airplane like gesture, like he's flying up to Aang.] I came across these fan-like contraptions!
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: Our gliders.
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: Yes! Little, light flying machines! [Waves his hands up and down.] They gave me an idea. Build a new life for my son, in the air! Then everyone will be on equal ground! So to speak. We're just in the process of improving upon what's already here. [Katara wipes her tears on Aang's shirt, and Sokka looks like he's holding back tears.] And, after all, isn't that what nature does?
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: Nature knows where to stop.
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: I suppose that's true. Unfortunately, progress has a way of getting away from us. Look at the time! [Points at candles.] Come! [To other workers.] The pulley system must be oiled before dark.
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: Wait, how can you tell the time from that thing? The notches all look the same.
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: The candle will tell us. Watch. [Candle pops four times.]
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: You put spark powder in the candle!
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: Four flashes. So it's exactly four hours past mid-day. Or, as I call it: four o'candle. [Sokka laughs. Cut to a frontal shot of the mechanist, pleased that Sokka is interested.] If you like that, wait till you see my finger-safe knife sharpener. [He holds up his left hand, revealing that three of the fingers are made of wood.] Only took me three tries to get it right. [He pulls off the three wooden fingers, and throws them into Sokka's hand.]
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Horrified.] Aaah!
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Pokes Sokka in the back with his one remaining finger and gestures for him to come.] Follow me! [Sokka runs after him.]
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: Hey, Aang. I want to show you something.
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: I just can't get over it. There's not a single thing that's the same.
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: I don't know about that. The temple might be different [Picks up hermit crab from the ground.] but the creatures that live here [Hands it to Katara.] are probably direct descendants of the ones who lived here a long time ago.
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Pokes hermit crab.] You're right. They're kind of keepers of the temple's origins. [Katara hands it to Aang. It moves around in his hand and he smiles.]
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: Besides, there's one part of the temple that hasn't changed at all.
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: Hey, it's just like the one in the other temple!
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Confidently, with a matter-of-fact tone.] Only an airbender can open it, so inside it's completely untouched. Just the way the monks left it. I've always wondered what it's like in there ...
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [She looks at him, as though slightly scared of his reaction. Her tone is gentle and questioning.] Aang?
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [He turns away from the door and his friends.] I'm sorry. This is the last part of the temple that's the same as it was. I want it to stay that way.
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Somewhat disappointed, although he tries not to let it show.] I completely understand. I just wanted you to know that it's here.
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: Thanks. [All three start to walk away.]
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: These lanterns are terrible. I can't see! [Opens the top of his lantern only to find them filled with fireflies.] Why would you want to use fireflies for light? [One flies out.]

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: Hey! Close that up! They'll get loose! [Sokka closes it.] Fireflies are a non-flammable light source. [Both begin to walk again.]

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: Cover your nose [Both plug their noses.] and hold your breath. [The mechanist opens an eye slot in the door, both look inside a pitch-black room.]
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Nasally, due to his nose being blocked.] Okay ... so you brought me all the way down here to see an empty room.
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Closes eye slot.] Wrong. It's filled to the brim with natural gas. Came across it my first time here. Unfortunately, I was carrying a torch at the time. Nearly blew my self and the whole place even more sky high! Thought my eyebrows would never grow back. [Pans up to his eyebrows.] Anyway, there's a vital problem that needs solving. From time to time, we have gas leaks. And they're nearly impossible to find.
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: So, this place is an explosion waiting to happen.
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: Yes, until I figure out how to locate something I can't see, hear, smell, or touch.

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: The wind will carry you. It supports something inside you. Something even lighter than air. [Shows Katara holding a glider and standing at the edge of a building.] And that something takes over when you fly. [Katara puts down her glider and looks up at the other people flying.]
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Nervously.] I've changed my mind. I think I was born without that something.

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: [Laughs.] Impossible! Everybody has it!

Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: Spirit.
Main Characters: Aang, Katara, Mechanist, Sokka, Teo
Minor Characters: Appa, Earth Kingdom colonists, Momo, Storyteller
Locations: Northern Air Temple

Dialogue: What?

Dialogue: [He is hesitant, but resigned as he begins to explain.] It was about a year after we moved here. Fire Nation soldiers found our settlement. You were too young to remember this, Teo. They were going to destroy everything! Burn it to the ground! I pleaded with them, I begged them to spare us! They asked what I had to offer. I offered ... my services. You must understand. I did this for you!

Episode Title: The Siege of the North, Part 1
Dialogue: [Displeased.] Nice try, Pupil Sangok. [Shows Sangok trying to break free.] A couple of more years and you might be ready to fight a sea sponge. [He unfreezes the ice; Sangok falls to the ground dazed.] Would anyone care for a rematch with Katara? [The scene cuts to several students sitting by the sidelines, the camera panning to the right showing all of them to be tired and unamused.] Katara, you've advanced more quickly than any student I've ever trained. [Cuts to a shot of Katara, who smiles brightly.] You have proven that with fierce determination, passion and hard work, you can accomplish anything. [Turns to Aang irritably.] Raw talent alone is not enough. [Cut to Aang who is lying on the ground with a lazy smile, floating Momo around on an airball above him.] Pupil Aang!

Dialogue: I finally have you, but I can't get you home because of this blizzard. [Stands up and looks outside the cave.] There's always something. Not that you would understand. You're like my sister. Everything always came easy to her. She's a firebending prodigy, and everyone adores her. My father says she was born lucky. He says I was lucky to be born. I don't need luck, though. I don't want it. I've always had to struggle and fight and that's made me strong. It's made me who I am.

Episode Title: The Siege of the North, Part 2
Dialogue: [Close-up of Yue.] When I was born I was very sick and very weak. [Flashback to Yue as a baby.] Most babies cry when they're born, but I was born as if I was asleep, my eyes closed. [Cut to waterbenders attempting to heal Yue as a baby.] Our healers did everything they could. [Panning shot of Yue and the waterbenders, along with Yue's parents.] They told my mother and father I was going to die. [Cut to Arnook staring at the moon.] My father pleaded with the spirits to save me. [Cut to shot panning down from the moon to the oasis.] That night, beneath the full moon, he brought me to the oasis and placed me in the pond. [Cut to Yue being placed into the pond.] My dark hair turned white. [Close-up of Yue in the oasis.] I opened my eyes and began to cry, and they knew I would live. [Cut to Yue in her parents arms with the archway and moon behind them.] That's why my mother named me Yue. [Cut back to Appa's saddle.] For the moon.

Minor Characters: Azula, Baboon spirit, Hahn, Hei Bai, Ozai, Roku, Water Tribe warriors

Dialogue: [Voice-over.] They built elaborate tunnels, so they could meet secretly. [The pattern of a labyrinth appears.] Anyone who tried to follow them would be forever in the labyrinth. [The couple kisses.] But, one day, the man didn't come [Cuts to a shot of the woman alone, looking startled.] - he'd died in the war between the two villages. [Arrows fly by the screen. The woman is seen weeping by a grave.] Devastated, the woman unleashed a terrible display of her earthbending power - she could have destroyed them all ... [The woman is seen displaying her immense earthbending power.] but, instead, she declared the war over. [Cuts to shot of the woman standing on a hill surrounded by the two villages.] Both villages helped her build a new city where they would live together in peace. [Shows picture of the current-day Omashu.] The woman's name was Oma and the man's name was Shu. [The characters for "Oma" appear followed by the character for "Shu". Flashback ends.] The great city was named Omashu as a monument to their love.

Dialogue: [The camera zooms out as he explains, slowly revealing more and more of the swamp. It shows how large the banyan-grove tree is compared to the others, but at the final magnification, it is impossible to distinguish it from the other trees.] See this whole swamp is actually just one tree spread out over miles. Branches spread and sink, take root, and spread some more. One big, living organism. Just like the entire world.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Due, Huu, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Tho
Minor Characters: Broadsword man, Iroh, Kya (vision), Slim, Toph (vision), Various Foggy Swamp Tribe members, Yue (vision), Zuko

Locations: Foggy Swamp, River village

Dialogue: Sure. You think you're any different from me or your friends or this tree? If you listen hard enough, you can hear every living thing breathing together. [Another shot shows the swamp river. There are the sounds of several animals heard in the background.] You can feel everything growing. We're all living together, even if most folks don't act like it. We all have the same roots and we are all branches of the same tree.

Minor Characters: Broadsword man, Iroh, Kya (vision), Slim, Toph (vision), Various Foggy Swamp Tribe members, Yue (vision), Zuko

Time is an illusion and so is death.

Dialogue: I think I know how to find them. [Aang kneels down and places his hand on the tree.] Everything is connected. [Energy travels from Aang's hand to Appa's location. Dialogue: Dad, I know it's probably hard for you to see me this way. But the obedient little helpless blind girl that you think I am just isn't me. I love fighting. I love being an earthbender, and I'm really, really good at it. I know I've kept my life secret from you, but you were keeping me secret from the whole world. You were doing it to protect me, but I'm twelve years old and I've never had a real friend. So, now that you see who I really am, I hope it doesn't change the way you feel about me.

Dialogue: "Both"?! [Rapidly turns to face Aang, her expression crazed and her eyes bloodshot.] I'M COMPLETELY CALM!!
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Awkwardly.] I can see that. [Backs off.]
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Mockingly.] The stars sure are beautiful tonight. Too bad you can't see them, Toph!
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Annoyed; pushes Katara off to the side.] Hey, how's a guy supposed to sleep with all this yelling [To Toph.] and earthquaking?
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Reopens her tent.] That thing is back!
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: Well, how far away is it? [Lies down and pulls covers of his sleeping bag over his head; says in a muffled voice.] Maybe we can close our eyes just for a few minutes.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Notices the smoke.] I don't think so, Sokka.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: Seriously, what is that thing?
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: And how does it keep finding us?
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Resting against the saddle; Sokka is seen lying on his back, sleeping.] I don't know. But this time, I'm going to make sure we lose it.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Lands onto the ground.] Okay, forget about setting up camp. [Crawls along the ground in sleeping bag.] I'm finding the softest pile of dirt and going to sleep.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Angrily; pulling her sleeping bag under her head as a pillow.] That's good because Toph wasn't going to help anyway!
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Irritated; lying on bag.] Oh, I didn't realize the baby still needed someone to tuck her in bed.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: Come on guys, there's something after us and we don't even know what [Pulls top part of his shirt over his head; says in a muffled voice.] or who it is.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: It could be Zuko. [Rolls over on her side.] We haven't seem him since the North Pole.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: Who's Zuko?
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Puts his head down.] Oh, just some angry freak with a ponytail who's tracked us all over the world.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Mockingly.] What's wrong with ponytails, Ponytail?
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Points to his top-knot.] This is a warrior's wolf tail.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Jokingly.] Well, it certainly tells the other warriors that you're fun and perky.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Raises head, unamused.] Anyway, whoever's chasing us couldn't have followed us here, so, now would everyone just shhh?
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Hold up finger to silence the lemur.] No Momo, shhh. [Relaxes.] Sleepy time.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Buries face in hands.] Oh, don't tell me ...
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: That's impossible. There's no way they could have tracked us.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: I can feel it with my own two feet!
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Nervously.] Let's get out of here.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Calmly.] Maybe we should face them. Find out who they are. Who knows, maybe they're friendly.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Hopelessly.] Always the optimist ...
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Alarmed.] It's those three girls from Omashu!
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Determined.] We can take them. Three on three.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: Actually Toph, there's four of us.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Sheepishly.] Oh, I'm sorry, I didn't count you. You know, no bending and all.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Turning to her, his face distorted with rage.] I can still fight!
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Smugly.] Okay, three on three plus Sokka.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Face turns red.] Errrgh!
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: Well, we wanted to find out who they were and we found out. [Puts boomerang away; Aang and Katara are seen fleeing.] Now let's get out of here.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: Appa, yip yip!
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Shocked.] I can't believe those girls followed us all the way from Omashu.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Grumpily.] I still think we could have taken them.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: Are you kidding me? [Points fingers upward repeatedly in gesture.] The crazy blue firebending and the flying daggers are bad enough, but last time we saw them, one of those girls did something that took my bending away. That's scary.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Complaining.] Oh no, the sun is rising. We've been up all night with no sleep!
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Calmly.] Sokka, we'll be okay.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Nervously.] Are you sure? I've never not slept before! [Holds hands up to his head.] What if I fall asleep now and something happens? [Freaks out; eyes bulge out.] And something always happens!
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: Every time we land, those girls are there. So we'll just have to keep flying.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: We can't keep flying forever.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Yawns.] So what's our plan?
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Slumped against the saddle, exhausted.] Don't know ... too tired to think.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: I'm sure we'll come up with something after a short nap. [Smiles.]
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Relieved.] Yes ... sleep.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Frantically.] What's going on?
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: Appa fell asleep!
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Urgently.] Wake up, buddy!
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: Appa's exhausted.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Trudging across the ground, carrying his sleeping bag.] Okay, we've put in a lot of distance between us and them. The plan right now is to follow Appa's lead and get some sleep.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Irritated.] Of course, we could've gotten some sleep earlier, [Depicts shot of Toph lying on the ground sleepily.] if Toph didn't have such issues.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Wakes up and slams the ground; screams furiously.] What!?
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Trying to calm the tension.] All right, all right, everyone's exhausted! Let's just get some rest.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Rises and faces Katara.] No, I want to hear what Katara has to say. You think I have issues?
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Irritated.] I'm just saying. Maybe if you helped out earlier, we could have set up our camp faster and gotten some sleep [Shouting.] and then maybe we wouldn't be in this situation!
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: You're blaming me for this?
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Desperately.] No! No, she's not blaming you.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Angrily.] No, I'm blaming her!
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: Hey, [Shoves Aang out of the way.] I never asked you for diddly-doo-dah. [Points her thumb at herself.] I carry my own weight. Besides, if there's anyone to blame, it's Sheddy over here!
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Sitting on Appa's tail.] What? You're blaming Appa?
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: Yeah, you want to know how they keep finding us? [Grabs a handful of Appa's fur and lets the sheddings blow away in the wind.] He's leaving a trail everywhere we go!
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Jumps down to face her.] How dare you blame Appa! He saved your life three times today! If there's anyone to blame it's you! You're always talking about how you carry your own weight, but you're not. He is! Appa's carrying your weight. He never had a problem flying when it was just the three of us!
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Stomps the ground, launching her pack into the air which she catches.] I'm out of here.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Moves in front of Toph, his arms outstretched to halt her.] Wait!
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: What did I just do? [Slumps.] I can't believe I yelled at my earthbending teacher. Now she's gone.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Regretfully.] I know. We're all just trying to get used to each other. And I was so mean to her.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [From afar, drinking from a cup.] Yeah, you two were pretty much jerks.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Sarcastically.] Thanks, Sokka.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: No problem.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: We need to find Toph and apologize.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: Okay, but what are we going to do about the tank full of dangerous ladies chasing us?
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Grabs a handful of fur and watches as it blows away in the wind.] I have a plan.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: Toph was right. The fur was leaving a trail right to us. But now that he's clean, no more trail.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: Are you sure he's okay to fly?
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: He'll be fine as long as we leave his saddle and all our stuff here. [Kneels down and places pieces of Appa's fur into his satchel.] I'm going to use Appa's fur to make a fake trail to lead the tank off-course.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: Ow ... That really hurt my tailbone.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Off camera; dryly.] Wads of wet fur. How delightful.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Thoughtfully.] Hmmm ... they're not wads, they're more like bundles, or bunches? [Scratching her head.] It's got an "uh" sound.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Unamused.] Clumps?
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Clasps her hands together and says brightly.] Clumps! They're clumps! [Hugs Mai.]
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [To Azula, pointing in direction of the trail.] The trail goes this way.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: The Avatar's trying to give us the slip. [Pointing to the broken treetops.] You two head in that direction and keep your eye out for the bison. [Looking down at fur trail.] I'll follow this trail.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Surveying the woods.] Toph couldn't have made it too far. [Momo begins to chitter and rears up defensively.] What is it, Momo? Ooooh, no! Katara!
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Shocked; urges Appa forward.] How did they find us?
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Urgently.] Appa, come on, we need to go faster!
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: He's too tired!
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Frantically.] Not good, not good! [Appa grunts. Cuts to ground level view of Mai and Ty Lee chasing after them. Cuts to shot of Appa heading toward the river.] We just need to make it across that river!
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Pleading.] Come on Appa, just a little further ...
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Voice-over.] We made it! We're safe.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Voice-over.] You did it Appa!
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Well off-balance.] Good try, but no.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: How are you doing?
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Frantically.] Well, you know ...
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Dryly.] I thought when Ty Lee and I finally caught you guys, it would be more exciting. Oh well, victory is boring.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Still lying on the ground.] Thanks Appa, I don't know what we'd do without you.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Wringing out her braid.] Was it just me, or was that guy kind of cute?
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: All right, you've caught up with me. Now, who are you and what do you want?
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Coolly.] You mean you haven't guessed? You don't see the family resemblance? Here's a hint. [Covers her eye and deepens her voice, imitating Zuko.] I must find the Avatar to restore my honor! [Aang remains silent; back in her normal voice.] It's okay, you can laugh. It's funny.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: So what now?
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Cuts to view of her left side.] Now? Now, it's over. You're tired and you have no place to go. [Cuts to view of her face.] You can run, but I'll catch you.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Rises to face her.] I'm not running.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Handing her a cup of tea.] Here is your tea. [Cuts to shot of Toph staring blankly at the ground and back to Iroh.] You seem a little too young to be traveling alone.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Taking the tea from his hand.] You seem a little too old.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Laughs.] Perhaps I am.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Casually.] I know what you're thinking ... I look like I can't handle being by myself.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: I wasn't thinking that.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: You wouldn't even let me pour my own cup of tea!
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: I poured your tea because I wanted to and for no other reason.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: People see me and think I'm weak. They want to take care of me, but I can take care of myself, by myself.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: You sound like my nephew, always thinking you need to do things on your own, without anyone's support. There is nothing wrong with letting the people who love you help you. Not that I love you, I just met you.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Laughs.] So where is your nephew?

Dialogue: I've been tracking him actually.

Dialogue: Is he lost?
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Looks away; slightly sad.] Yes, a little bit. [Cuts to shot of the rocky ledge where the two sit, the mountain region in the background; voice-over.] His life has recently changed and he's going through very difficult times. He's trying to figure out who he is and he went away.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Locations: Nan Shan River, Several campsites, Tu Zin

Dialogue: So now you're following him.

Dialogue: I know he doesn't want me around him right now, but if he needs me, I'll be there.

Dialogue: Your nephew is very lucky, even if he doesn't know it. [Gets up to leave.] Thank you.

Dialogue: My pleasure. Sharing tea with a fascinating stranger is one of life's true delights.

Dialogue: [Happily.] No, thank you for what you said. It helped me.

Dialogue: I'm glad.

Dialogue: [Rises to leave, but turns around briefly.] Oh, and about your nephew, maybe you should tell him that you need him, too.

Dialogue: [Determined.] Back off, Azula! He's mine!

Dialogue: [Coolly, backing up as her enemies surround her.] Well, look at this. Enemies and traitors, all working together. I'm done. [Raises her hands in surrender.] I know when I'm beaten. You got me. A princess surrenders with honor.

Dialogue: [Horrified.] Aaaah!

Dialogue: [Angrily.] Ugggh! [Looks at Team Avatar.] Get away from us!

Dialogue: Zuko, I can help.

Dialogue: [Blasts an arc of fire.] Leave!

Dialogue: Today's the day! [Lands near a sleeping Sokka.] Can you believe it? After all that time searching for a teacher, I'm finally starting earthbending! [Momo chitters and lands on Sokka.] And this place, [Momo moves on to Appa's head.] it's perfect, don't you think? Sokka? [Sokka grumbles and glares at Aang with tired eyes.] Oh, you're still sleeping, huh? [Sokka again grumbles and puts his head back down. Aang whispers.] Sorry.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Foo Foo Cuddlypoops, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph, Zuko
Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)

Dialogue: Goooood morning, [She puts both her hands on her hips.] earthbending student!

Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)

Dialogue: [Aang bows slightly to Toph; disappointed and tiredly.] Hey, you never called me Sifu Katara.

Dialogue: Sorry, Snoozles, we'll do our earthbending as [Whispers slightly, though with amusement in her voice.] quietly as we can.

Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)

Dialogue: [Excitedly.] So what move are you going to teach me first? [Stretches out his right arm, his fist clenched, and brings it down like a hammer.] Rock-a-lanche? [He brings his left clenched fist to his right elbow, while his right arm is bent upward, the fist also clenched. He trembles with the motion.] The Trembler? Oh, maybe I could learn to make a [Stretches both arms over his head and starts to spin around.] whirlpool out of land!
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Foo Foo Cuddlypoops, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph, Zuko
Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Puts a hand on Aang's chest.] Let's start with ... [Makes the gesture.] move a rock.

Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)

Dialogue: [Claps excitedly.] Sounds good, sounds good!

Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Dialogue: The key to earthbending is your stance. You've got to be steady and strong. Rock is a stubborn element. If you're going to move it, you've got to be like a rock yourself.

Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Dialogue: Good. Now the actual motion of this one is pretty simple. [Slams the rock against the canyon wall.] Okay, you ready to give it a try?

Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Dialogue: I'm ready. [Tries to move it, but instead he is forced backward into Appa.]

Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)

Dialogue: My beloved Lu Ten, I will see you again.

Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)

Dialogue: Uncle ... you were unconscious. Azula did this to you. It was a surprise attack.

Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)

Dialogue: Somehow, that's not so surprising. [Groans.]

Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)

Dialogue: [Hands Iroh some tea.] I hope I made it the way you like it. [Iroh takes a sip from the cup and his eyes widen. He lets out a cry of disgust, but manages to mask it.]
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Foo Foo Cuddlypoops, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph, Zuko
Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Grimaces.] Good. That was very ... uhhh ... bracing. [He is handed another cup, which he throws out secretly behind his shoulder.]
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Foo Foo Cuddlypoops, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph, Zuko
Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Dialogue: So Uncle, I've been thinking. It's only a matter of time before I run into Azula again. I'm going to need to know more advanced firebending if I want to stand a chance against her. I know what you're going to say: she's my sister and I should be trying to get along with her.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Foo Foo Cuddlypoops, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph, Zuko
Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [With the exact opposite of Zuko's thoughts.] No, she's crazy, and she needs to go down. [Zuko nods. Iroh grunts as he stands up.] It's time to resume your training.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Foo Foo Cuddlypoops, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph, Zuko
Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Dialogue: I don't understand what went wrong. He did it exactly the way you did.

Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Dialogue: Maybe there's another way ... what if I came at the boulder from another angle?

Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Dialogue: No. That's the problem. You've got to stop thinking like an airbender. There's no different angle, no clever solution, no trickety-trick that's going to move that rock. You've got to face it head on. And when I say head on, I mean like this ... [Jumps up and destroys the rock with her head.]
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Foo Foo Cuddlypoops, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph, Zuko
Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Trying to help Toph teach.] I've been training Aang for a while now. He really responds well to a positive teaching experience. Lots of encouragement and praise. Kind words. If he's doing something wrong, maybe a gentle nudge in the right direction.

Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Dialogue: Thanks, Katara. A gentle nudge. I'll try that. [Moments later; yelling at the top of her lungs.] Keep your knees high, Twinkle Toes!

Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)

Dialogue: You're awfully cute, but unfortunately you're made of meat. Just a bit closer ... [Jumps but falls into a crack that is in the ground. He looks at the cub.] Gotcha! [Sinks further in.] You are one lucky little meat creature.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Foo Foo Cuddlypoops, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph, Zuko
Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)

Dialogue: Lightning is a pure expression of firebending, without aggression. It is not fueled by rage or emotion the way other firebending is. Some call lightning the cold-blooded fire. It is precise and deadly, like Azula. To perform the technique requires peace of mind.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Foo Foo Cuddlypoops, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph, Zuko
Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Dialogue: I see. That's why we're drinking tea, to calm the mind.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Foo Foo Cuddlypoops, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph, Zuko
Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Dialogue: Oh yeah, good point! I mean, yes. [Outside.] There is energy all around us. The energy is both yin and yang. Positive energy and negative energy. Only a select few firebenders can separate these energies. This creates an imbalance. The energy wants to restore balance, and in a moment the positive and negative energy come crashing back together, you provide release and guidance, creating lightning. [Steps up, and generates lightning, and shoots it away from the two.]
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Foo Foo Cuddlypoops, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph, Zuko
Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Dialogue: I'm ready to try it!
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Foo Foo Cuddlypoops, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph, Zuko
Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Dialogue: Remember, once you separate the energy, you do not command it. You are simply its humble guide. Breathe first.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Foo Foo Cuddlypoops, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph, Zuko
Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Dialogue: This time we're going to try something a little different. Instead of moving a rock, you're going to stop a rock. Get in your horse stance! I'm going to roll that boulder down at you. If you have the attitude of an earthbender, you'll stay in your stance and stop the rock. Like this! [Stretches out, still in stance.]
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Foo Foo Cuddlypoops, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph, Zuko
Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Dialogue: Sorry Toph, but are you really sure this is the way to teach Aang earthbending?
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Foo Foo Cuddlypoops, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph, Zuko
Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Dialogue: I'm glad you said something. Actually there is a better way. [Blindfolds Aang.] This way, you'll actually have to sense the vibrations of the boulder to stop it. Thank you, Katara.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Foo Foo Cuddlypoops, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph, Zuko
Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Sarcastically.] Yeah, thanks, Katara!

Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Nervously.] Heh.

Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Dialogue: I guess I just panicked. I don't know what to say.

Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Dialogue: There's nothing to say, you blew it! You had a perfect stance, and a perfect form. But when it came right down to it, you didn't have the guts!

Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Disappointed.] I know. I'm sorry.

Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Dialogue: Yeah, you are sorry! If you're not tough enough to stop the rock, then you can at least give it the pleasure of smashing you instead of jumping out of the way like a jelly-boned wimp! Now, do you have what it takes to face that rock like an earthbender?
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Foo Foo Cuddlypoops, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph, Zuko
Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Dialogue: No, I don't think I do.

Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)

Dialogue: Aang, it's no big deal. You'll take a break and try earthbending again when you're ready. Besides, you still have a lot of waterbending to work on. Okay?

Dialogue: Yeah, whatever, go splash around until you feel better.

Dialogue: Why can't I do it? Instead of lightning it keeps exploding in my face ... like everything always does.

Dialogue: Zuko, you must let go of your feelings of shame if you want your anger to go away.

Dialogue: But I don't feel any shame at all. I'm as proud as ever.

Dialogue: Prince Zuko, pride is not the opposite of shame, but its source. True humility is the only antidote to shame.

Dialogue: You probably think I deserve this, don't you? Look, I'm sorry I hunted you, but that's just the natural order of things. Big things eat smaller things, nothing personal. But this time it didn't work out that way. I admit it ... you're cute. Okay, you convinced me, if I get out of this alive, it's a karmically correct, vegetarian existence for me. No meat. Even though meat is so tasty. [The cub brings an apple.] Hey, looks like my karma is already paying off! That's okay, I got it. [Tosses his boomerang at it in a desperate attempt.] Now, come back boomerang.

Dialogue: Fire is the element of power. [Draws the firebending insignia in the dirt.] The people of the Fire Nation have desire and will, and the energy and drive to achieve what they want. Earth is the element of substance. [Draws the earthbending insignia.] The people of the Earth Kingdom are diverse and strong. They are persistent and enduring. Air is the element of freedom. [Draws the airbending insignia.] The Air Nomads detached themselves from worldly concerns and found peace and freedom. Also, they apparently had pretty good senses of humor! [Smiles broadly but returns to a more serious demeanor when Zuko doesn't react at all.] Water is the element of change. [Draws the waterbending insignia.] The people of the Water Tribe are capable of adapting to many things. They have a deep sense of community and love that holds them together through anything.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Foo Foo Cuddlypoops, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph, Zuko
Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Dialogue: It is important to draw wisdom from many different places. If you take it from only one place, it becomes rigid and stale. Dialogue: If you let the energy in your own body flow, the lightning will follow it. You must create a pathway from your fingertips, up your arm to your shoulder, then down into your stomach. The stomach is the source of energy in your body. It is called the sea of chi. Only in my case it is more like a vast ocean. [Laughs.] From the stomach, you direct it up again, and out the other arm. The stomach detour is critical. You must not let the lightning pass through your heart, or the damage could be deadly. You may wish to try a physical motion, to get a feel for the pathways' flow, like this. [The two begin to practice the redirection motion.] Now, are you focusing your energy? Can you feel your own chi flowing in, down, up, and out?
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Foo Foo Cuddlypoops, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph, Zuko
Minor Characters: Lu Ten (Iroh's dream only)
Locations: Abandoned house in Earth Kingdom, Quarry campsite, Tu Zin

Dialogue: [Side-view of room.] Until now, you've been treated as our honored guest. [Cut to side-view of Long Feng and Aang. Long Feng steps forward and bends down to look Aang in the eye. Aang stares back at Long Feng, angrily.] But from now on, you will be watched every moment by Dai Li agents. If you mention the War to anyone, you will be expelled from the city. [He turns around and walks over to the hearth with the green fire.] I understand you've been looking for your bison. [View of Long Feng turning slightly to look at Aang.] It would be quite a shame if you were not able to complete your quest. [Aang appears frightened, but his expression soon changes to that of anger. Cut to an overhead shot of the room. Long Feng sits down, as Joo Dee opens the doors and walks toward the group.] Now, Joo Dee will show you to your home.

Dialogue: Oh, dear. You've been through so much recently. Hurt and betrayed. So twisted up inside. [Moves his hand.] You're still full of love. Ah. But fear has moved in where trust should be. [The camera shows a further shot of the balcony and pans up to the Air Temple; voice-over.] I've been expecting you and the young Avatar for quite a long time. I had a vision many years ago of helping him. That's why I came to the Eastern Air Temple. [Closer shot of Appa and Pathik.] Oh, your emotions are so turbulent. Like swirling storm clouds. [Puts his hand on Appa's forehead.] Let the clouds in your mind be gentle, peaceful ones. [Appa purrs and the shot fades to black.]

Dialogue: I have prepared a message for Aang. May I attach it to your horn? [Appa mutter in agreement and Pathik ties the scroll to Appa's horn. Cut to the leaves falling overhead and pan down to Appa and Pathik.] You and the Avatar's energies are mixed. You have an unbreakable bond. By reading your energy, I can sense where Aang is. [Appa licks him.] Funny, what invisible strings connect us all. [Places his hand on Appa's forehead. Further shot of the Air Temple as a path of light illuminates a pathway.] I'll see you again, great beast. [Closer shot of Pathik and Appa.]

Dialogue: [While pacing back and forth.] The Earth King and the Council of Five do not trust the Dai Li. They imprisoned your leader, Long Feng. Soon they will turn on all of you and eliminate you. Seizing power today is a matter of life and death. [As she talks, an agent with a mustache starts looking nervous and slightly lowers his head.] This coup must be swift and decisive. The Earth King and each of the five generals must be taken out simultaneously. Long Feng has placed you in my command while we overthrow the government. [Walks over to her left, to another agent with a tiny, vertical scar on his right cheek. When she nears him, she stares sideways at the agent while still addressing all the agents.] If I sense any disloyalty, any hesitation, any weakness at all, [She stops right in front of the scarred agent.] I will snuff it out. [She continues walking, with the eyes of the now nervous scarred agent following her.] That is all.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph

Dialogue: After what happened at Ba Sing Se, we had to get you to safety. We flew back to Chameleon Bay where we found my father and the other Water Tribe men. [Flashback of Kuei preparing to leave by taking off his Earth King robes, revealing traveling robes beneath.] The Earth King decided he wanted to travel the world in disguise, so he set off alone. [Bosco is shown taking off his own attire and hat before Kuei jumps on Bosco and they set off.] Well, not completely alone. [Cut back to Sokka continuing the story.] Soon, the bay was overrun by Fire Nation ships. Rather than fight them all, we captured a single ship and made it our disguise. Since then we've been traveling west. We crossed through the Serpent's Pass a few days ago. We've seen a few Fire Nation ships, but none have bothered us.
