Dialogue: [Sliding food into Iroh's cell as Iroh keeps his back to him.] I brought you some komodo chicken. I know you don't care for it, but I figure it beats prison food. I admit it, I have everything I always wanted, but it's not as all how I thought it would be. The truth is, I need your advice. [Grips the bars.] I think the Avatar is still alive, I know he's out there, I'm losing my mind. [Iroh does not respond. Desperately.] Please, Uncle, I'm so confused I need your help. [Iroh still has nothing to say to him. Angrily.] Forget it, I'll solve it myself! Waste away in here for all I care! [He glances back before leaving, and a tear slides down Iroh's face.]

Dialogue: [Jumps up the hill.] Excuse me, I don't mean to bother you, but my friend's sick and we're on kind of a tight schedule. [Continues to follow her down the hill as she crosses the river.] Wait! But I'm a great bridge between your world and mine! [Aang freezes some water to form stepping stones to cross the river.] I know Hei Bai! We're close personal friends! [Katara moves faster, and Aang jumps on a wooden bridge. Katara runs out of the river onto the docks and notices Aang's reflection in the water. She looks up and sees Aang running across a roof.] Heeey! [He suddenly hits a pole, Katara flinches and feels sorry for him but continues on across the river to the other side. She stops to look out at the village thinking she is safe but Aang drops in front of her.] My name's Aang. I'm the Avatar. [Lifts his headband and points at his arrow.]

Locations: Fire Nation Army factory, Jang Hui, Jang Hui River

Dialogue: Maybe she is a waterbender, but she was just trying to help you. Because of her, that factory won't be polluting your river, and the army is gone. You should be down on your knees thanking her!

Minor Characters: Appa, Dock/Xu/Bushi, Jang Hui boy, Momo, Painted Lady

Dialogue: Sokka, it's okay. [She steps forward and moves Sokka back. To the villagers.] I shouldn't have acted like someone I wasn't, and I shouldn't have tricked you. But I felt like I had to do something. It doesn't matter if the Painted Lady is real or not. Because your problems are real, and this river is real. You can't wait around for someone to help you. You have to help yourself.

Minor Characters: Appa, Dock/Xu/Bushi, Jang Hui boy, Momo, Painted Lady

Dialogue: Sokka, when you first arrived, you were so unsure. You even seemed down on yourself. [Frontal view of Piandao as the camera pans across to the right revealing Fat.] But I saw something in you right away. [Side-view of Sokka.] I saw a heart as strong as a lion turtle, and twice as big. [Side-view of the room.] And as we trained, it wasn't your skills that impressed me. [Fat kneels to Piandao and gives him the sword. Frontal view of Piandao as he turns back to face the camera.] No, it certainly wasn't your skills. [Brief close-up of Sokka, who looks down in shame, before cutting back to a close-up of Piandao.] You showed something beyond that. [Unsheathes the sword, showing its black blade. Cut to side-view of Piandao as the camera zooms out and follows the blade as he strikes out to the side.] Creativity, versatility, [Frontal view of Sokka with the sword in the foreground.] intelligence ... [Sokka looks down.] these are the traits that define a great swordsman. [Side-view of Piandao as he sheathes the sword.] And these are the traits that define you. [Kneels and presents the sword to Sokka. Cut to frontal view of Sokka, from Piandao's perspective, who takes it.] You told me you didn't know if you were worthy, [Close-up shot as he stands up.] but I believe that you are more worthy than any man I have ever trained.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Piandao, Sokka, Toph
Minor Characters: Fat, Poon, Weapons store shopkeeper
Locations: Capital City Prison, Piandao's castle, Shu Jing

Dialogue: I'm sorry, Master. You're wrong. [Close-up of Piandao.] I am not worthy. [Side-view of Sokka.] I'm not who you think I am. I'm not from the Fire Nation. I'm from the Southern Water Tribe. [Cut to side-view of Aang, Katara, and Toph who all gawk at Sokka with shock and disbelief. Close-up side-view of Piandao and Sokka.] I lied so that I could learn swordsmanship from you. I'm sorry. [Offering his sword back.]
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Iroh, Katara, Momo, Piandao, Sokka, Toph
Minor Characters: Fat, Poon, Weapons store shopkeeper
Locations: Capital City Prison, Piandao's castle, Shu Jing

Episode Title: The Avatar and the Fire Lord
Dialogue: [She sighs.] Oh, Zuko, it's so strange how your mind works. [Cut to an overhead shot of the hall, as Azula tells Zuko about Sozin's history.] Fire Lord Sozin began the war, of course. [Cut to Fire Lord Sozin's portrait, as it pans from the bottom to the top.] He spent his early years secretly preparing for it. He was as patient as he was clever. He famously waited for the comet, later renamed Sozin's Comet, and used its power to launch his full-scale invasion of the world. [Cut back to Zuko and Azula.] In the end, he died a very old and successful man.

Episode Title: The Avatar and the Fire Lord
Dialogue: With Roku gone, and the great comet returning, the timing was perfect to change the world. [Cut to Sozin, standing on a balcony, from the behind, looking at his soldiers and the Fire Navy ships.] I knew the next Avatar would be born an Air Nomad. So I wiped out the Air Temples. [Scene changes to a burning temple. The camera slowly fades into an extreme close-up of Sozin's face.] But somehow, the new Avatar eluded me. [Scene changes to Fire Navy ships searching in the polar regions.] I wasted the remainder of my life searching in vain. [Cut to underside of the ship.] I know he's hiding out there somewhere. [Camera pans below to show the iceberg Aang was trapped in.] The Fire Nation's greatest threat ... the last airbender.

Episode Title: The Avatar and the Fire Lord
Dialogue: Because understanding the struggle between your two great-grandfathers can help you better understand the battle within yourself. [Zuko sits down, with his head facing down.] Evil and good are always at war inside you, Zuko. It is your nature, your legacy. But, there is a bright side. [Zuko looks up.] What happened generations ago can be resolved now, by you. Because of your legacy, you alone can cleanse the sins of our family and the Fire Nation. Born in you, along with all the strife, is the power to restore balance to the world.

He gasps in horror and rips it off the wall. Hawky screeches.] You're right, Hawky. This is bad. [Suddenly, the bird poops while standing on Sokka's arm.]

Dialogue: When our mom died, that was the hardest time in my life. Our family was a mess, but Katara? She had so much strength. She stepped up and took on so much responsibility. She helped fill the void that was left by our mom.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Minor Characters: Dealer, Town authority
Locations: Fire Fountain City

Dialogue: I guess I never thought about that.

Minor Characters: Dealer, Town authority
Locations: Fire Fountain City

Dialogue: I'm gonna tell you something crazy. I never told anyone this before, but honestly? I'm not sure I can remember what my mother looked like. It really seems like my whole life, Katara's been the one looking out for me. She's always been the one that's there. And now, when I try to remember my mom, Katara's is the only face I can picture. [Katara, touched by what Sokka says, is reduced to tears.]
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Minor Characters: Dealer, Town authority
Locations: Fire Fountain City

Dialogue: The truth is sometimes Katara does act motherly, but that's not always a bad thing. She's compassionate and kind, and she actually cares about me. [Wipes away tears from her left eye.] You know, the real me. That's more than my own mom. [Katara, deeply touched by Toph's words, sinks slightly into the water. Toph punches Sokka in the arm.] Don't ever tell her I said any of this!
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Minor Characters: Dealer, Town authority
Locations: Fire Fountain City

Minor Characters: Dealer, Town authority
Locations: Fire Fountain City

Dialogue: [Smiles.] Actually I wasn't going to apologize. I was gonna say ... I wanna pull a scam with you. [Aang and Sokka stare at her from behind, extremely shocked.]

Minor Characters: Dealer, Town authority

Dialogue: Not just any scam. The ultimate scam. [Sokka and Aang, still staring at her with shock, look at each other and faint, foaming from the mouth slightly. Katara puts her arm around Toph's shoulder, who gives a sly smile.] Whaddaya say, Toph? Just me and you. One last go. You in?
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Minor Characters: Dealer, Town authority

Dialogue: [Excited.] You know I'm in! Now what's this idea of yours? [They walk away and leave Aang and Sokka behind, who are now unconscious and foaming at the mouth.]

Minor Characters: Dealer, Town authority

Dialogue: The plan is simple: This wanted poster says you're worth a lot of money; Ten times more than you've made in all of your scams. So I'm gonna turn you in and collect the reward. Dialogue: One winter when Mom was a girl, a snowstorm buried the whole village for weeks. A month later, Mom noticed she hadn't seen her friend Nini since the storm. So Mom and some others went to check on Nini's family. When they got there, no one was home. [Cuts to ground-level shot of the group sitting around the fire, the camera panning slightly to the right.] Just a fire flickering in the fireplace. While the men went out to search, Mom stayed in the house. When she was alone, she heard a voice. [In a scary voice.] "It's so cold and I can't get warm!" [Sokka stiffens in fear.] Mom turned and saw Nini standing by the fire. She was blue like she was frozen. Mom ran outside for help, but when everyone came back, Nini was gone.

[Imitates a walking puppet.] And I looked up at the moon for what I thought would be my last glimpse of light. Dialogue: [Voice-over.] The guards were always very careful to keep any water away from us. They piped in dry air and had us suspended away from the ground. Before giving us any water, they would bind our hands and feet so we couldn't bend. [A side-view is shown of Fire Nation guards giving water to a tied up prisoner.] Any sign of trouble was met with cruel retribution. [Cuts to shot of the full moon in the sky during present day.] And yet each month, I felt the full moon enriching me with its energy. [Cuts to shot of Hama.] There had to be something I could do to escape. [Scene fades to flashback of the prison.] Then I realized that where there is life, there is water. [A younger Hama is shown bending the water inside an elephant rat that had wandered its way into her cage.] The rats that scurried across the floor of my cage were nothing more than skins filled with liquid and I passed years developing the skill that would lead to my escape. [A close-up is shown of Hama smiling at her discovery. The scene fades back to present day. Ominously.] Bloodbending. [Cut to a scared Katara.] Controlling the water in another body, [Cut to ground shot of both Hama and Katara.] enforcing your own will over theirs. [The scene fades back to a flashback of young Hama controlling a horde of rats using bloodbending.] Once I had mastered the rats, I was ready for the men.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph
Minor Characters: Ding, Kanna (flashback only), Local villagers, Prisoners, Yao
Locations:
Fire Island Prison (flashback only), Hama's village
Hama's inn, Hama's inn, Mountain prison, Southern Water Tribe (flashback only)
Wolf Cove (flashback only), Wolf Cove (flashback only)

Dialogue: [Voice-over.] And during the next full moon, I walked free for the first time in decades. [The guard attempts to get up, but Hama quickly forces him back down to the ground. She walks unsteadily away.] My cell unlocked by the very guards assigned to keep me in. [Scene changes back to present day; camera focuses on a close-up of Hama.] Once you perfect this technique, you can control anything or [Looks at Katara from the corner of her eyes sadistically.] anyone.

Episode Title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
Dialogue: Good morning everyone. Ahh! [Trips on stage.] Umm ... so, as you know, today, we're invading the Fire Nation! I mean I know you know that because otherwise why else would you be here? [Laughs nervously.] Uh anyway, [Dropping scrolls. Unraveling one on a board.] the Fire Lord's palace is here [Points at map, realizing it isn't the map, flips the chart several times until it is the map.]. Uh nope, uh wait, uh wait, uh wait, it's here, [Brief shot of Due scratching his head.] and uh, there's an eclipse today and Aang's gonna fight the Fire Lord and the firebenders won't have any fire to use so that's good for us! [Brief shot of Teo and the mechanist looking on.] And ... um ... I'm sorry let me start at the beginning [Stands up straight, and begins talking very fast.]. Katara and I discovered Aang frozen in an iceberg, now I didn't like Aang at first but grew to love him over time, then we went to the Southern Air Temple where Aang used to live and then we met Suki, [Water Tribe warrior yawns.] who's a Kyoshi warrior. She dressed me like a woman and then she kissed me, and then Aang's friend was a crazy old king and ...

Episode Title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
Dialogue: [Interrupting.] Thank you, Sokka. It's okay why don't you take a break? [Sokka leaves the stage to sit down, disappointed in himself. Hakoda addresses the crowd.] Let me just clarify a few points for everyone. [Shot of Haru stroking his chin. Everyone pays attention to Hakoda.] Today, is the day of black sun, and I want to thank you all for your self-sacrifice, and your courage. There are two steps to the invasion, a naval stage, and then a land stage. [Shot of Sokka looking down, sad, Katara, Momo and Aang looking at Hakoda and Toph.] To gain sea access to the Fire Nation capital, we need to get past our first major obstacle here, [Points at map.] The Great Gates of Azulon. Next, we hit the land, and we hit hard. We must fight past their battlements and secure the plaza tower. Once we do that, it's up to the Royal Palace. At that point, the eclipse will begin.

Episode Title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
Dialogue: No, I've learned everything! And I've had to learn it on my own! Growing up, we were taught that the Fire Nation was the greatest civilization in history. And somehow, the War was our way of sharing our greatness with the rest of the world. What an amazing lie that was. The people of the world are terrified by the Fire Nation. They don't see our greatness. They hate us! And we deserve it! [Camera view shows top profile of Zuko and Ozai through an overhead grate.] We've created an era of fear in the world. And if we don't want the world to destroy itself [Cuts to shot of Zuko.], we need to replace it with an era of peace and kindness.

Uhhh ... so, the thing is I have a lot of firebending experience, and I'm [Places an arm on his chest with pride.] considered to be pretty good at it. [He continues smiling.] Well, you've seen me, you know, when I was attacking you. [His eyes widen.] Uhhh ... yeah, I guess [Places his fingers against his forehead in embarrassment.] I should apologize for that. But anyway, [Waves an arm to the side dismissively.] I'm good now. [Clenches both fists and places one on his chest while the other arm is raised.] I mean, I thought I was good before, but I realize I was bad, [He gets visibly uncomfortable and drops his arms into a slouch.] but anyway, I think it's time I joined your group and taught [Straightens up with a sincere expression on his face.] the Avatar firebending. [A badgerfrog croaks at him. Angrily.] Well, what's your answer? [The badgerfrog hops on his head before hopping away.] Yeah ... that's what I'd say, too. How am I supposed to convince these people that I'm on their side? What would Uncle do? [Imitating Iroh.] Zuko, you have to look within yourself to save yourself from your other self. Only then will your true self, reveal itself. [Normal voice.] Even when I'm talking for him I can't figure out what he means. What would Azula do? [Imitating Azula.] Listen, Avatar, I can join your group, or I can do something unspeakably horrible to you and your friends. Your choice. [Normal voice. Stops and sits down.] I guess I'm just not that good at impersonations.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph, Zuko
Minor Characters: The Duke, Haru, Iroh (flashback only), Teo
Locations: Western Air Temple, Zuko's campsite

Dialogue: Hey, what about me? I did the boomerang thing.

Minor Characters: The Duke, Haru, Iroh (flashback only), Teo
Locations: Western Air Temple, Zuko's campsite

Dialogue: Listen, I know I didn't explain myself very well yesterday, I've been through a lot in the last few years, and it's been hard. But I'm realizing that I had to go through all those things to learn the truth. I thought I had lost my honor, and that somehow my father could return it to me. But I know now that no one can give you your honor. It's something you earn for yourself, by choosing to do what's right. All I want to do now is play my part in ending this war, and I know my destiny is to help you restore balance to the world. [To Toph.] I'm sorry for what I did to you. [Bows to her.] It was an accident. Fire can be dangerous and wild, so as a firebender, I need to be more careful and control my bending, so I don't hurt people unintentionally.
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph, Zuko
Minor Characters: The Duke, Haru, Iroh (flashback only), Teo
Locations: Western Air Temple, Zuko's campsite

Dialogue: [Looks at Zuko shocked, hearing these words, and thinks for a moment.] I think you are supposed to be my firebending teacher. When I first tried to learn firebending, I burned Katara, and after that, I never wanted to firebend again. But now I know you understand how easy it is to hurt the people you love. I'd like you to teach me. [Bows before Zuko.]
Main Characters: Aang, Appa, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Toph, Zuko
Minor Characters: The Duke, Haru, Iroh (flashback only), Teo
Locations: Western Air Temple, Zuko's campsite

Dialogue: I told you, [Cut to Zuko sitting on a dry fountain and wiping his head with a cloth.] my father hasn't come here since our family was actually happy. And that was a long time ago. It's the last place anyone would think to look for us.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: You guys are not gonna believe this! There's a play about us.

Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Cut to close-up of her and Sokka.] We were just in town and we found this poster! [Sokka shows the poster for the play to the team. It depicts Katara, Aang, and Sokka with Zuko's scarred face in the background.]
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: What? How is that possible?
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Listen to this ... [Turns the poster toward him.] "The Boy in the Iceberg is a new production from acclaimed playwright Pu-on Tim, [Cut to a close shot of the poster as the camera pans up.] who scoured the globe gathering information on the Avatar, from the icy South Pole to the heart of Ba Sing Se. [Shot changes to show Team Avatar.] His sources include singing nomads, pirates, prisoners of war, and a surprisingly knowledgeable merchant of cabbage."
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: "Brought to you by the critically acclaimed Ember Island Players."

Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Recalling a memory.] Ugh! My mother used to take us to see them. They butchered Love Amongst the Dragons every year!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Sokka, do you really think it's a good idea for us to attend a play about ourselves?
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Persuasively.] Come on, a day at the theater? This is the kind of wacky time-wasting nonsense I've been missing! [He holds up the poster anxiously and smiles sheepishly; Katara looks away, appears nonplussed.]
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [To Zuko; points to his seat and tries to act casual.] Hey, uh ... I wanted to sit there.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Removing his hood.] Just sit next to me. What's the big deal?
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: I was just, I wanted to ... okay. [Sits down.]

Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Why are we sitting in the nosebleed section? My feet can't see a thing from up here!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Sighs.] Sokka, my only brother! We constantly roam these icy South Pole seas, and yet never do we find anything fulfilling!

Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Cut to Actor Sokka, a thin, lanky man.] All I want is a full feeling in my stomach! I'm starving!

Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Is food the only thing on your mind?
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Cut to shot of the actor.] Well, I'm trying to get it out of my mind and into my mouth! I'm starving! [Audience laughs.]

Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Leans forward in his seat; clearly annoyed.] This is pathetic! My jokes are way funnier than this! [Extends his arm in a dramatic gesture.]

Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Cut to the stage where Actress Katara now stands in the canoe.] Every day, the world awaits a beacon to guide us, yet none appears! [Cut to close-up of the actress who holds her hand out and clasps her hands together dramatically.] Still, we cannot give up hope! For hope, [Begins to cry.] is all we have! And we must never relinquish it, even ... [Sniffs and falls back into a sitting position.] even to our dying breath! [Leans over the side of the canoe and buries her face in her hands, crying.]
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Closer shot of the silhouette swaying from side to side inside the iceberg prop.] But who? Who is the boy in the iceberg?

Dialogue: [Laughs; in a high-pitched voice.] I'm the Avatar, silly, here to spread joy and fun! [She leans toward Actress Katara, laying a finger on her lips, and also motions toward Actor Sokka before standing upright and spreading her arms out in a cheery gesture.]

Dialogue: Wait, is that a woman playing me?

Dialogue: [Gasps.] An airbender! [Clasps her hands to her chest.] My heart is so full of hope, [Drops down on one knee emotionally.] that it's making me tearbend! Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: My stomach is so empty, that it's making me tearbend! [Throws his arms up hopelessly before dropping to his knees, clutching on to Actress Aang's other leg, and crying.] I need meat! [Cut to close-up of Actor Sokka.]

Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Excitedly; shielding his eyes with his hand and turning his head, searching for the alleged dumplings.] Ooh, where, where?

Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Laughs and swings arm jovially.] Did I mention that I'm an incurable prankster? [Crosses her legs as the audience laughs.]

Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Cut to wide shot of Team Avatar. Aang extends his arm toward the stage, angry with the actress' bad portrayal.] I don't do that! That's not what I'm like! And I'm not a woman! [Throws hands up in frustration.]

Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Determined.] I don't have time to stuff my face! [Lowers his telescope and turns to Actor Iroh.] I must capture the Avatar to regain my honor! [Faces out into the audience, clutching his hand in a fist assertively.]

Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Cut to wide shot of the model ship.] Well, while you do that, [Actor Zuko looks at him, annoyed.] maybe I'll capture another slice. [He holds the cake up higher before bringing it toward his face and proceeding to gobble it down ravenously and noisily.]

Dialogue: [Turns his view from Actor Iroh, in disgust.] You sicken me!

Dialogue: [Gestures toward the stage.] They make me look totally stiff and humorless.

Dialogue: Hey look, I think I found something! [Tiptoes to the bush. Actor Sokka scratches his head while Actress Katara shrugs. Actress Aang picks up the Momo prop, a rabbit-monkey puppet.] It's a flying rabbit-monkey! I think I'll name him, Momo! [Laughs; using puppet.] Hi everybody, I love you! [The audience laughs.]

Dialogue: Ugh.

Dialogue: Goodbye, Sokka! I have important moon duties to take care of! [Exits on the moon prop.] And yes, I did have pickled fish!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Laughs.] You never told me you made out with a Moon Spirit.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Placing a finger on Suki's lips] Shhh! [Tearing up.] I'm trying to watch! [Suki, disgusted by Sokka's act, looks away, and folds her arms.]
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Laughs.] The Avatar is back to save the day! Yay! [Actress Aang stomps three more miniature ships before tripping over her Koizilla costume and falling.]
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Ugh!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Unimpressed] So far, this intermission is the best part of the play.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Walks down the stairs holding a bag of flaming fire flakes and sits next to Suki.] Apparently, the playwright thinks I'm an idiot who tells bad jokes about meat all the time!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Hint of sarcasm.] Yeah, you tell bad jokes about plenty of other topics.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Eats a fire flake.] I know!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Angry.] At least the Sokka actor kind of looks like you. [Sokka becomes furious over Aang's remark while Suki gleefully smiles.] That woman playing the Avatar doesn't resemble me at all!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: I don't know, you are more in touch with your feminine side than most guys.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Standing up, angrily.] Argh!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Relax, Aang. They're not accurate portrayals. It's not like I'm a preachy crybaby who can't resist giving overemotional speeches about hope all the time. [Everyone looks at her.] What?
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Turns around and sits down. Sarcastically.] Yeah, that's not you at all.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Listen friends, it's obvious that the playwright did his research. I know it must hurt, but what you're seeing up there on that stage is the truth.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Well, here we are in the Earth Kingdom!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Opens up her miniature air glider prop.] I'd better have a look around to see if I can find an earthbending teacher! [Jumps up into the air with a cable lifting her up.]
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: This is it, this must be where I come in!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: I flew all over town, but I couldn't find a single earthbending master!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Joyfully] Here it comes ...
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Enters the stage from a trapdoor beneath the rock prop and holds it above his head.] You can't find an earthbending master in the sky, you have to look underground! [Throws away the prop.]
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Who are you?
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Spits.] My name's Toph, [Flexes.] because it sounds like tough, and that's just what I am! [Audience laughs.]
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Wait a minute, [Picks at her ear with her pinky.] [Confused.] I sound like a guy. A really buff guy.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Well Toph, what you hear up there is the truth. It hurts, doesn't it?
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Are you kidding me? I wouldn't have cast it any other way! [Laughs as Katara looks away in dismay.] At least it's not a flying bald lady! [Camera pans to Aang, who turns toward the stage in annoyance.]
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: So, you're blind? [Waves hand in front of Actor Toph's eyes.]
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Laughs.] I can see you doing that. I see everything that you see, except I don't "see" like you do. I release a sonic wave from my mouth. [Screams very loudly at the Team Avatar players. The audience and Team Avatar grimace at the scream; Aang claps his hands over his ears, Zuko grips the railing in front of him, Suki and Sokka hug each other in terror, and Katara grits her teeth while Toph looks excited.] There. I got a pretty good look at you. [Actress Aang and the audience claps.]
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Zuko, it's time we had a talk ... [Points to Zuko, who now wears a large wig.] about your hair, it's gone too far!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Maybe it's best if we ... split ... up! [Actors Zuko and Iroh walk away from each other.]
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Azula, my sister, what are you doing here?
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: You caught me. Wait, what's that? [Points in the distance.] I think it's your honor!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Where? [Everybody looks while Actress Azula escapes through a door.]
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Turning to audience.] She escaped, but how?
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: If she continues drilling, this wall will come down for sure!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Blocks the rock prop.] Haha, yes! Continue drilling! The city of Ba Sing Se can hide no longer!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: No, Jet! What did they do to you?
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Must ... serve ... Earth King! [Begins swinging his hook hand wildly at Actress Aang and Actor Sokka.] Must ... destroy!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Did Jet just... die?
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: You know, it was really unclear.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: I have to admit Prince Zuko, I really find you attractive!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Shot changes to show him sitting on a rock bench.] You don't have to make fun of me.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: But I mean it! [Sits down with Actor Zuko.] I've had eyes for you since the day you first captured me! [Zuko and Katara inch away from each other, slightly uncomfortable. Aang narrows his eyebrows.]
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Stands up.] Wait, I thought you were the Avatar's girl! [Aang nods.]
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Laughs.] The Avatar? [Stands up and walks toward Actor Zuko.] Why, he's like a little brother to me! [Laughs.] I certainly don't think of him in a romantic way. [Aang grows concerned.] Besides, how could he ever find out about ... this? [Actress Katara and Actor Zuko embrace and hold hands while Actress Katara pops up one leg. Aang gets up.]
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Whispering.] Oh, you're getting up? [As Aang leaves.] Can you get me some fire flakes? [Puts his arm around Suki, but whispers to Aang again.] Ooh, and fire gummies! [Puts his arm back around Suki, who looks slightly annoyed.]
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Well, my brother, what's it going to be? Your nation, or a life of treachery?
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Stops drinking from a cup.] Choose treachery, it's more fun! [Winks and gives a thumbs up sign.]
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: No way!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Pushes Actor Iroh over and walks to Actress Azula.] I hate you, Uncle! You smell, and I hate you for all time!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [To Zuko.] You didn't really say that, did you?
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: I might as well have.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Avatar State, yip yip!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Not if my lightning can help it!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: The Avatar is no more!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: It seems like every time there's a big battle, you guys barely make it out alive. I mean, you guys lose a lot!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: You're one to talk, Suki. Didn't Azula take you captive? That's right, she did!

Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Looks at Sokka seriously.] Are you trying to get on my bad side?

Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: I'm just saying ...
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Does anyone know where Aang is?
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: He left to get me fire gummies, like, ten minutes ago. And I'm still waiting!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: I'm gonna check outside.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Are you all right?
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Angered.] No, I'm not! I hate this play! [Yanks his hat off and throws it on the ground.]
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: I know it's upsetting, but it sounds like you're overreacting.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Overreacting? If I hadn't blocked my chakra, I'd probably be in the Avatar State right now!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Suki, what are the chances you can get me backstage? I got some jokes I want to give to the actor me.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Seriously.] I'm an elite warrior who's trained for many years in the art of stealth. [Smiling.] I think I could get you backstage! [Sokka and Suki leave.]
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [To Zuko, after observing everyone's reactions.] Geez, everyone's getting so upset about their characters. Even you seem more down than usual, and that's saying something!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: You don't get it, it's different for you. You get a muscly version of yourself, taking down ten bad guys at once, and making sassy remarks.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Yeah, that's pretty great!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: But for me, it takes all the mistakes I've made in my life, and shoves them back in my face. My uncle, he's always been on my side, even when things were bad. He was there for me, he taught me so much, and how do I repay him? With a knife in his back. It's my greatest regret, and I may never get to redeem myself.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Sits down next to him.] You have redeemed yourself to your uncle. You don't realize it, but you already have.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: How do you know?
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Because I once had a long conversation with the guy, and all he would talk about was you.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Really?
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Yeah, and it was kind of annoying.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Oh, sorry.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: But it was also very sweet. All your uncle wanted was for you to find your own path, and see the light. Now you're here with us. He'd be proud. [Punches Zuko on the shoulder.]
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Ow! What was that for?
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: That's how I show affection.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Your Zuko costume's pretty good, but your scar's on the wrong side. [Runs off.]
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: The scar's not on the wrong side! [Covers his face with his hood.]
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: He's coming this way!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Can I help you?
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Actually, I think I can help you. I'm a big Sokka fan, but I don't think you're representing him quite as well as you could be.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Starts walking away.] Aww no, another fan with ideas.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Runs in front of him.] Just hear me out. [Pulls out some cards.] Here's something I think the real Sokka would say. [Clears throat.] What does the cabbage merchant use to fix his cabbages? A cabbage patch!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Chuckles.] That's actually pretty good! Let me see those! [Takes the cards from Sokka. Reads one and laughs.] "A rocky relationship" ... not bad!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Puts his arm around Actor Sokka's shoulder.] Also, don't be afraid to make up some phrases, especially before an attack. Something like ... "Flying kick-a-pow!". [The two begin to walk away.]
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Who are you, anyway?
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: I'm just a guy who likes comedy.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Katara, did you really mean what you said in there?
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: In where? What are you talking about?
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: On stage, when you said I was just like a ... brother to you, and you didn't have feelings for me.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: I didn't say that. An actor said that.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: But it's true, isn't it? We kissed at the Invasion, and I thought we were gonna be together. But we're not.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Aang, I don't know.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Why don't you know?
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Because, we're in the middle of a war, and, we have other things to worry about. This isn't the right time.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Well, when is the right time?
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Aang, I'm sorry, but right now I'm just a little confused.
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: I just said I was confused! I'm going inside. [Exits the balcony.]
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: [Frustrated.] Ugh, I'm such an idiot! [Puts down his head on the balcony railing.]
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko
Locations: Ember Island Theater, Ozai's beach house

Dialogue: Here's what you missed ... we went to the Fire Nation, and you got better, and Katara was the Painted Lady, and I got a sword, and I think Combustion Man died. Oh, look, the Invasion's about to start! Shhh!
Main Characters: Aang, Ember Island Players, Katara, Momo, Sokka, Suki, Toph, Zuko

Episode Title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King

Cut back to Ozai smiling.] permanently. [The shot changes to an aerial view of the map which Ozai walks to the center.] From our airships, we will rain fire over their lands, a fire that will destroy everything; and out of the ashes, a new world will be born, a world in which all the lands are Fire Nation and I am the supreme ruler of everything! [War generals applaud.]

Dialogue: [Close-up.] I am Avatar Kuruk. [Cut to flashback to a close-up view of a younger Avatar Kuruk. The camera zooms out to show him surfing.] When I was young, I was always a go-with-the-flow kind of Avatar. [The camera pans round to follow his movements on the wave before holding steady as he surfs away.] People seemed to work out their own problems, and there was peace and good times in the world. [Cut to shot of the sun and the camera pans down to Kuruk with Ummi and they kiss.] But then, [Fade to a side-view of Koh in the Spirit World. Koh moves in front of the camera to reveal the face of Ummi.] I lost the woman I loved to Koh, the Face Stealer. [Fade back to close-up side-view of present-day Kuruk.] It was my fault. If I had been more attentive and more active, [Close-up of Aang.] I could've saved her. Aang, [Close-up of Kuruk.] you must actively shape your own destiny and the destiny of the world. [Vanishes. Frontal view of Aang, even more disappointed as he places his head in his hands.]

The true heart can tough the poison of hatred without being harmed.
